title: Baby Wipes, Scented, Huggies Nourish & Care Baby Diaper Wipes, 56 Count, Pack of 3 Flip-Top Packs (168 Wipes Total)
description: Clean, hydrate, nourish, and sooth your baby's delicate skin with the 4 in 1 Sensitive Skincare of Huggies Nourish & Care Baby Wipes. These scented wipes are 20% thicker** for a cloth-like feeling and infused with cocoa and shea butter ingredients to clean and moisturize with every wipe. Offering you plant-based ingredients for over 20 years, these baby wipes are , dermatologist-tested and pH-balanced to help maintain healthy skin. They're also alcohol free, paraben free and do not contain phenoxyethanol or MIT, so you can feel confident you're giving your baby soft, smooth skin with every wipe. Plus, with a flip-top design and EZ Pull 1-Handed Dispensing, you can easily grab wipes without wasting sheets. Join Huggies Rewards+ powered by Fetch to get rewarded. Earn points on Huggies diapers and wipes, in addition to thousands of other products to redeem for hundreds of gift cards. Download the Fetch Rewards app to get started today! (*70%+ by weight ) (**compared to Huggies Natural Care Baby Wipes)
